pkgmetadata.longdescription: # translate-htmlTranslate HTML using [Beautiful Soup](https://beautiful-soup-4.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) and [Argos Translate](https://github.com/argosopentech/argos-translate).## Install```pip install translatehtml```## Links- [Developement video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S28XOIvRzwo&list=PLe6dpCSdH0zRlFBBzE1mfdRv6CWttmkcL)- [OpenNMT Forum](https://forum.opennmt.net/t/suggestions-for-translating-xml/4409)- [Discussion](https://github.com/argosopentech/argos-translate/discussions/158)
